story_12_03000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Oh, Flint... Your flame can’t have been
snuffed out that easily.
story_12_03000/2401_1001_0400_10:
But I’m done for...
Burned right down to cinders...
story_12_03000/2401_1001_0600_10:
This experience has given me so much to be
inspired about! I feel like I could turn it into
a spectacular novel.
story_12_03000/2401_1001_0700_10:
I guess it’s not as easy to succeed
in the PML as I thought.
story_12_03000/2401_1001_0800_10:
We did have a burning-hot battle
thanks to you, though, Shauntal!
story_12_03000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Um, [Name:PlayerNickname ]? Would you be
willing to let Flint here join your team?
story_12_03000/2401_1001_1200_10: Huh? What’re you talkin’ about, Shauntal?
story_12_03000/2401_1001_1300_10:
Flint, you and Infernape have a fire within you.
Your flame burns brightly, and you have the
potential to burn even brighter still!
story_12_03000/2401_1001_1400_10:
It’s time to use that flame to shine a light
on [Name:PlayerNickname ] and [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="his" F="her" ] Pokémon.
story_12_03000/2401_1001_1600_10:
Well, I’m an author as well as a Pokémon
Trainer. Sometimes it’s better for me to take
a step back and observe the bigger picture.
story_12_03000/2401_1001_1700_10:
What do you think, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
Will you let Flint join your team?
story_12_03000/2401_0301_1800_10: I’m ready to feel the burn!
story_12_03000/2401_0302_2000_10:
All this fire and passion might be a
bit too much for me...
story_12_03000/2401_0402_2100_10:
Aww, c’mon! You can never have too much heat!
Let me on the team. I promise you won’t regret it!
story_12_03000/2401_1001_2200_10:
Oh, and in case you didn’t catch my name,
I’m Flint, a Fire-type user who specializes
in burning-hot battles!
story_12_03000/2401_1001_2300_10: I’m looking forward to teaming up with you!
